author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It’s once again been proven that a successful Netflix series can still get dropped without much notice. While the first season of this particular series was a huge success for the platform, and quickly led to the greenlight of a second season, it’s the follow-up season that faced a decline. As such, Netflix isn’t taking [...]

The post Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Just Two Seasons appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Just Two Seasons
